item.title: Creating a Samba drive in Linux
item.author: sumitros@gmail.com (Sumitro Bhaumik)
item.description: Creating a Samba drive on Linux has several advantages. It is cross-platform Well, that’s it. It has its issues though, like the recent randomeware attack WannaCry was based on an exploit «EternalBlue» which was present in Samba. However, if we can overlook it, we can create an easy file sharing system. Now let us see how to create a Samba drive Steps to take Install Samba
